text: Skardu District is part of Baltistan and currently constitutes one of the seven districts of the Gilgit Baltistan territory (formerly Northern Areas) of Pakistan. ==Tehsils== *Kharmang Tehsil *Gultari Tehsil *Rondu Tehsil *Shigar Tehsil Category:Districts of Gilgit-Baltistan
title: Skardu District
